Do you know what makes Flash and Flex different? Wondering what all the fuss about AIR is about?

Download slides (PDF) While discussing RIA platforms at my previous employer, many developers were using Flash, Flex, and AIR interchangeably. Admittedly, I didn't know the difference either! This presentation was designed to be a brief overview to spur discussion and encourage a technical due-diligence, rather than be a boring, exhaustive evaluation (of which I am in no way qualified to provide). Not to mention provide context as to what else exists in this space.
